home-carousel.launching-desc: The launching of ISEREC marks collaboration for sustainable energy innovation.
home-carousel.launching-desc-2: Involving global institutions, ISEREC fosters cutting-edge photovoltaic technology research.
home-carousel.mou-desc: A cross-nation partnership driving innovation and sustainable technology forward.

news-1.title: The Launching Of Iserec
news-1.desc: E20  (Engineering 20) is a proposal by Indonesia Institution of Engineers to be a engagement group of G20. It is a bold agenda to rapture Engineers from Engineering to become Leader Engineers who shall contribute in an effective way to deal with economic, environmental and health care challenges and issues.

pii-and-e20.p1: E20  (Engineering 20) is a proposal by Indonesia Institution of Engineers to be a engagement group of G20. It is a bold agenda to rapture Engineers from Engineering to become Leader Engineers who shall contribute in an effective way to deal with economic, environmental and health care challenges and issues.  We have had received support from many countries, including China. We are on the way to be a full pledge Engagement Group of G20.
pii-and-e20.p2: E20 is designed to be an Engagement Group of G20.  It is designed to possess the following characteristics:
pii-and-e20.e-20-characteristics-1: Indonesia is the “initiator” of E20 when Indonesia hosts G20 in 2022.
pii-and-e20.e-20-characteristics-2: Indonesia’s active initiatives are its contributions to current world challenges and resolutions in dealing with Climate Change, digital transformation, and health care.
pii-and-e20.p3: E20 will, apart from rhetoric and image building exercises, serve as a platform for collaboration to produce tangible and real outcomes such as green energy transition, digital applications to multiple industrial sectors in workable manners and focusing on efficient and cost-effective production of health care products.
pii-and-e20.p4: E20 will serve a productive platform of G20 to  produce significant  global impacts and positive contributions to solve many issues and challenges facing economies and societies.
pii-and-e20.p5: Under the E20 platform and spirit, a Research Centre on Solar Cell Semiconductor, a collaboration with SERIS (Solar Energy Research Institute of Singapore), will be launched on 2nd October 2024. ISEREC also collaborates with other Indonesian universities and research institutions such as the Institute of Technology of Bandung (ITB), the University of Indonesia (UI), University of Gajahmada (UGM), Badan Riset Nasional (BRIN) and others to form a collaborative network.
pii-and-e20.p6: Under a collaborative platform between Singapore and Indonesia concerning renewable energy, the Solar Energy Research Institute of Singapore (SERIS) at the National University of Singapore (NUS) and the Institution of Engineers Indonesia (PII) has formed a collaboration to constitute the Research and Development for the purposes of organizing a world class research and development on solar photovoltaic (PV) technologies involving local and international institutions, companies and other non-governmental organizations.

background-iserec.title: BACKGROUND OF ISEREC
background-iserec.p1: The Sustainable Energy Association of Singapore (SEAS) representing a Consortium of companies (the Consortium Members) in collaboration with E20 Team proposed a development plan of Riau Green Economic Corridor in 2022.
background-iserec.p2: Pursuant thereof, SEAS, Consortium Members and MARVES have held a number of meetings which were also attended by the Energy Market Authority of Singapore (EMA) and one of commitments of the Consortium Members is to support a Research and Development program for solar photovoltaic (PV) technologies (from solar cells to modules and systems) as a part of the intended End-to-End commitments.
background-iserec.p3: It was agreed that the Solar Energy Research Institute of Singapore (SERIS) at the National University of Singapore (NUS) and the Institution of Engineers Indonesia (PII) to collaborate to constitute the Research and Development commitment mentioned above for the purposes of organising a world class research and development on solar photovoltaic (PV) technologies involving local and international institutions, companies and other non-governmental organisations.
background-iserec.p4: ISEREC  will collaborate with other Indonesian universities and research institutions such as the Institute of Technology of Bandung (ITB), the Institute of Technology of Indonesia (ITI), Badan Riset Nasional (BRIN) and others to form a collaborative network.

objective-iserec.title: OBJECTIVES OF ISEREC
objective-iserec.p1: The following is a non-exhaustive list of the objectives of the Indonesia Solar Energy Research Centre (ISEREC):
objective-iserec.education-1: Collaborate with various global Universities and Institutions
objective-iserec.education-2: Supporting PhD and Post-doctoral students in solar cell technologies
objective-iserec.education-4: Exchange of faculty members for study, research, and participation in educational programs
objective-iserec.education-5: Exchange of scholars for lectures, talks, and sharing of experience
objective-iserec.education-6: Exchange of publications in fields of interest to both universities
objective-iserec.technology-1: To develop an Indonesian Team to be highly proficient in solar photo voltaic technologies
objective-iserec.technology-2: To support Indonesian companies to develop manufacturing capabilities
objective-iserec.advisor-1: Provide advisory support to companies and other institutions based on the above-mentioned works

working-group-desc: The Indonesian Solar Energy Research Center (ISEREC) is designed to be the spearhead in research, development and implementation of cutting-edge solar energy solutions. At the heart of ISEREC's mission are six Working Groups each dedicated to advancing important aspects of solar energy technology and its ecosystem.
working-group-intro: There is a working group consisting of 6 WGs:
